attributes.action: Reduce crime, HIV, drug usage, drug related deaths by decriminalisation of all drugs
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, hereby petition the UK government to be pioneers in Drug Policy.

It has been proven that the 'War on Drugs' (Nixon) is connected to the 'War on HIV'.
All you have to do is search 'WAR on HIV' in Google and you will see for yourself that the two are INEXTRICABLY linked.

There is no scientific reason why Alcohol should be legal and no other drug shouldn't. Some, currently classed as recreational, drugs would be beneficial to a lot of people suffering with pain, chronic illnesses and mental problems.

The public should be educated and drugs should be regulated.

We petition the government to decriminalise and educate as the HIV epidemic will never come under control otherwise.
